main_definition: To have been to a place or seen someone, usually by going there.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To go and see someone who is not at home.
To have been to a particular place or location.
meanings_and_examples.example: During our vacation, we visited many famous landmarks in Italy.

meanings_and_examples.definition: When referring to places such as museums, libraries, and other institutions.
meanings_and_examples.example: I visited the art gallery exhibit last weekend.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To check or examine someone/something for a particular purpose.
meanings_and_examples.example: The teacher visited the classroom to see how her students were progressing.
